title: World Clock Towers Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of the world's most famous clock towers, from ancient timepieces to modern marvels.

questions.question: Big Ben is actually the name of the great bell inside which London clock tower?
The Prague Astronomical Clock, one of the oldest working astronomical clocks, was first installed in which century?
The Rajabai Clock Tower, modeled after Big Ben, is located in which Indian city?
The Abraj Al-Bait Clock Tower in Mecca is one of the tallest clock towers in the world. How tall is it?
The Zytglogge, a medieval clock tower with an astronomical clock and animated figures, is in which Swiss city?
The Clock Tower at St. Mark's Square (Torre dell'Orologio) features two bronze figures that strike the hours. Where is it?
The Peace Tower, featuring a large clock and carillon, is part of the Parliament Buildings in which country's capital?
The Spasskaya Tower, with its famous clock, is a prominent tower of which fortification?
The Allen-Bradley Clock Tower in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, was once the largest four-faced clock in the world. It was surpassed by which clock?
The Rathaus-Glockenspiel, a famous clock tower with jousting knights and dancing coopers, is located in which German city?
The Wrigley Building Clock Tower, a Chicago landmark, was built by the company famous for producing what?
The Joseph Chamberlain Memorial Clock Tower, known as 'Old Joe,' is the tallest freestanding clock tower in the world and is located at which university?
The Tsim Sha Tsui Clock Tower, a relic of the former Kowloon railway station, is located in which city?
The Zimmer Tower in Lier, Belgium, is famous for what unique astronomical feature?
options: The Jubilee Clock with 13 clocks and dials

questions.question: The Sultan Abdul Samad Building, featuring a prominent clock tower, is a landmark in which Southeast Asian capital?
